ml:Announcement.ml:title: O'Reilly Strata Conference, Feb 1-3: All things data!
ml:Announcement.ml:author: Eric Bloch

img.style: display: block; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto;
img.title: Strata

ml:body.ml:teaser: The MarkLogic Developer Community is a proud sponsor and participant in the upcoming and inaugural O'Reilly Strata conference, February 1-3 in Santa Clara, CA. As a benefit, O'Reilly is also offerning our community members a 30% discount on the conference pass. (Register with the code str11mrk.)
ml:body.p: If you take a peek at the conference web site, you'll be amazed at the shmorgashboard of presentations, speakers, and topics lined up. The conference covers data analysis, data Analytics, data Structures, databases, data visualization, Big Data, data science, and basically all things "data". It's an exciting time to involved with data these days and as experts in 80% of the worlds business data, we'll be there. This is an opportunity to meet, learn from, and network with practitioners, like MarkLogic, who are "making data work". I hope to see you there!
